Text: **Can upload individual character stories if file size is to large! Just let me know if you want it and I'll get to it as soon as possible**

Relax, dude. We can select what series we want right from the torrent. And besides, it's less than 1GB. Maybe it would've been a problem when we were all on dial-up, but we have broadband, now. 1GB is nothing.

Thanks for the up.

@ muckymucks

I understand the way people use the internet is alot faster than it was a few years ago, but there are still people out there who have a rough time downloading a 1GB file so I want to make it as convinient as possible for those who dont have a great internet package! and no problem!
